review: We purchased two and have recommended it to our friends and family. We use it to stream Netflix, HuluPlus, and Viki through their respective apps. The chrome tab casting worked well on my newer macbook air, but it had some syncing issues (audio didn't match the video) when using an older samsung i5 windows 7 machine.
